Traits.Name: Fortify
Traits.Description: At the end of their turn, gains vigilance 1.

Traits.Name: Defiance
Traits.Description: Prevents hit points from being reduced past 1 hp. When this triggers, remove this effect and character becomes immune to all damage for the rest of the current turn.

Actions.Name: Blackheart
Actions.Effect: Gains +1 boon and true strike if character is stunned, dazed, or winded.

Actions.Name: Hilt Strike
Actions.Effect: An adjacent foe must save or become dazed, if they are already dazed, they are also winded.

Actions.Name: Great Bash
Actions.Description: Dash forward up to 3 spaces, then an adjacent foe is shoved 3 spaces.

Actions.Name: Great Shieldwall
Actions.Description: Reduce max speed to 0, but self and adjacent allies gain resistance. Ends at the start of the Archon's next turn.
